response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds an immense value of $1,000,000 to me due to its unique features, craftsmanship, and the years of dedication poured into its creation. I am offering this masterpiece to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This opportunity not only allows you to acquire a piece of unparalleled quality but also supports the continuation of our innovative processes and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 950000}
